atha khalu pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
ayaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo mahāyānam upadeṣṭavyaṃ manyeta.
atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
mā haivāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya mahāyānam upadiśāmi.
